Project settings¶

This only lists settings that have docstrings. See the relevant settings files for the complete settings, or run:

$ python manage.py diffsettings

Base settings¶

Django settings for cc_licenses project.

Deploy settings¶

cc_licenses.settings.deploy.ENVIRONMENT = 'production'¶

deploy environment - e.g. “staging” or “production”

Development settings¶

cc_licenses.settings.dev.CELERY_ALWAYS_EAGER = True¶

Run celery tasks synchronously

cc_licenses.settings.dev.CELERY_EAGER_PROPAGATES_EXCEPTIONS = True¶

Tell us when a synchronous celery task fails

cc_licenses.settings.dev.EMAIL_BACKEND = 'django.core.mail.backends.console.EmailBackend'¶

Don’t send emails, just print them on stdout
